titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that Dr. Frank G. Burke is recognized for his faithful service to the National Archives of the United States of America.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 12/3/1987--Introduced. Recognizes and expresses the gratitude of the Congress to Dr. Frank G. Burke for his service to the National Archives.
